text: Honor Medal (, ghirsebis medali) is an honor awarded by the government of Georgia. It was established in 1992. == Statute == Established in 1992, the Honor Medal is awarded to Georgian citizens who actively participated in the revival of Georgia and devoted themselves to noble deeds. ==Notable recipients== * Eter Tvaradze * Miho Mosulishvili ==See also== *Orders, decorations, and medals of Georgia *Order of Queen Tamara (2009) == References == * Georgian Law on Georgian State Awards Category:Democratic Republic of Georgia Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of Georgia (country)
title: Honor Medal (Georgia)
